3_15ut3jo5bqiURh7QZnajDmC9GG2o9psEjB.body: Bit451 is an open source decentralized / distributed anonymous p2p media network. It has been characterized as “YouTube meets BitTorrent meets Bitcoin”.  Is it possible to integrate Bit451 into ZeroNet or at least get some ideas from Bit451. http://bit451.org/
